pageContext.claim: “Our tax reform and tax plan is coming along very well. It's going to be out very soon.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flip-flop of an earlier flip-flop. Less than a week before he made this claim, Trump said he would not release any guidelines on rewriting the tax code until a new health-care bill passes -- which was a flip-flop from when he said he would pursue a tax code overhaul rather than move forward with a health-care bill.
